name: Ext_R5_NutritionProduct_instance
title: Cross-version Extension for R5.NutritionProduct.instance for use in FHIR R4B
description: This cross-version extension represents NutritionProduct.instance from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/NutritionProduct|5.0.0 for use in FHIR R4B.

element.short: One or several physical instances or occurrences of the nutrition product
element.definition: Conveys instance-level information about this product item. One or several physical, countable instances or occurrences of the product.
element.comment: `NutritionProduct.instance` maps to R4B `NutritionProduct.instance`. Changed from an array to a single value (max cardinality from * to 1). So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget.

element.short: The amount of items or instances
element.definition: The amount of items or instances that the resource considers, for instance when referring to 2 identical units together.
element.comment: `NutritionProduct.instance` maps to R4B `NutritionProduct.instance`. Changed from an array to a single value (max cardinality from * to 1). So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget.

element.comment: `NutritionProduct.instance` maps to R4B `NutritionProduct.instance`. Changed from an array to a single value (max cardinality from * to 1). So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget.

element.short: The identifier for the physical instance, typically a serial number or manufacturer number
element.definition: `NutritionProduct.instance` maps to R4B `NutritionProduct.instance`. Changed from an array to a single value (max cardinality from * to 1). So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget.

element.short: The expiry date or date and time for the product
element.definition: The time after which the product is no longer expected to be in proper condition, or its use is not advised or not allowed.
element.comment: `NutritionProduct.instance` maps to R4B `NutritionProduct.instance`. Changed from an array to a single value (max cardinality from * to 1). So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget.
